thread.title: FCC Discloses Opening Bids in TV Airwaves Auction
thread.title_full: FCC Discloses Opening Bids in TV Airwaves Auction - WSJ

author: Thomas Gryta
title: FCC Discloses Opening Bids in TV Airwaves Auction
text:
The Federal Communications Commission set the opening bids it is making to buy broadcast television licenses in the spring, with high prices designed to bring TV stations into a process that will eventually clear new airwaves for wireless carriers.
The prices, which range from less than $100 million in smaller markets to as much as $900 million for a station in New York City, are likely to come down from their initial levels. The FCC... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
